channel.title: App on Gabriel's blog
channel.description: Recent content in App on Gabriel's blog

item.title: Sharing post - Its the future
item.description:
Very interesting post/satire that makes me think how difficult is build simple applications nowadays.

We have a lot of good applications and tools, but to start something, maybe we don't need.

Is a very good exercise for me try to create a simple application instead of build huge applications just for me.
